Body:
"""
        Check that a tree can be built with a continuous dependent variable
        """
tree = CHAID.Tree.from_numpy(self.ndarr, self.random_arr, alpha_merge=0.999,
    max_depth=5, min_child_node_size=11, dep_variable_type='continuous',
    weights=self.wt)
assert round(tree.tree_store[0].p, 4) == 0.1594
assert len(tree.tree_store) == 9
